query.querystr: stmt s, s1,s2,s3,s4,s5; call ca, ca1; constant c; read r,re,re1; print pn; stmt n, n1,n2,n3; if ifs, ifs1,ifs2; while w, w1,w2; variable v,v1,v2; assign a,a1,a2; procedure p,p1,p2,p3,p4,p5; Select <ifs, r, a> pattern ifs ( v, _, _ ) and w ( _, _) and a (_,_"x"_) such that Parent*(ifs1,r) and Parent*(w1,ifs2) and Modifies(s2, v1) and Modifies(p5, v1) and Follows(re,re1) and Uses(s,v2) and Follows*(n,n3) and Next*(ca, n2) and and Next(w2, a2) and Affects(a1,s1) such that Affects*(160,s5) and Calls(p,p1) and Calls*(p4,_) with p2.procName = p3.procName with c.value = 1
